name: Feed Mother
description:
Do your Mother's bidding in this small game, Feed Mother. You are an obedient child monster who must go about, eating smaller, less fortunate creatures in order to feed your Mother who has grown too large to feed her self. Grow your horrendous body as you gorge yourself and fill your stomach with pre-digested food. If Mother's tentacles grow long enough, perhaps she might reward you.

This game was created for the 34th Ludum Dare game jam. The theme's of the jam were Growing and Two Button Controls.

Controls:
Left or "A" - Turn left
Right or "D" - Turn right
Left+Right or "A"+"D" - Vacuum

Green Flocker Bugs: Good
Purple Stink Bugs: Bad
Parasites: ???

To feed your Mother, simply press your mouth against her.

Aiden George @clabbaged - Programming

James Callaway @callacallaway - Art

Aidan Sawers - Music
